model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class describing a Player. The class is used as a superclass to HumanPlayer and ComputerPlayer.
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.
